trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 6th 1948
Summary: witnessed ufo from chevaz reveigne coming out from eleshian park,california in the summer of 1949.
divs: Sighting DetailsI and my brothers were playing in our back field under the trees on the property where we lived in Chevez Reviegne,California, I believe the street was named Repolsa,when I heard a very very high pitched sound.It was like such a high piercing sound that it closely resembled what the squeel of a pig would sound like if it were amplified a hundred times over.It made me come out to see what was producing such a sound.Looking north towards Elishian Park Hills I saw this metalic luster colored object.It was shaped like a "v" and it was slowly rising up from the hills with what appeared to be its nose pointing west.As it slowly arose horizonally,not turning in any direction,just rising slowly upward is when I noticed the rear of the object was infact closed and not open as you might expect.Thats when the thing just disappeared.The whole experience probably lasted nomore than five minutes,but it left a life long impression on me.I was more intrigued,as one could imagine a four or five year old would be under those circumstances,than frightened. After a while all of the houses were bought out in that area and our house,on the top of the hill,with the police acadamy at the bottom,was later removed.The police acadamy is still there.Its all still there,the Park and the school that I attended near there, in Echo Park.But the BIG QUESTION remains too.Where did the thing I saw go?,and Are there anymore like it out there?
